channel.title: Performance on Nathan Barta
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Nathan Barta

item.title: Maxing out MapKit: Optimizing map views for high perfomance
item.description: All changes require minimal code changes and boost perfomance substantially. This is not a tutorial on how to use a map view. Dequeue If you are looking at this blog, there is a high chance you already know the following optimization. Map Views are set up very similary to Table Views from an interface perspective. Developers should make sure they dequeue MKMapAnnotations. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 func mapView(_ mapView: MKMapView, viewFor annotation: MKAnnotation) -> MKAnnotationView?
